scripts.flatten:contracts: mkdir -p ./build/flattened/ && steamroller contracts/IColonyNetwork.sol > build/flattened/flatIColonyNetwork.sol && steamroller contracts/IColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIColony.sol && steamroller contracts/IReputationMiningCycle.sol > build/flattened/flatIReputationMiningCycle.sol && steamroller contracts/IMetaColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIMetaColony.sol && steamroller contracts/IRecovery.sol > build/flattened/flatIRecovery.sol && steamroller contracts/IEtherRouter.sol > build/flattened/flatIEtherRouter.sol
scripts.test:reputation: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && nyc truffle test ./test/reputation-system/* ./test/reputation-system/reputation-mining-client/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test/contracts-network/* ./test/extensions/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts:upgrade:parity: npm run start:blockchain:client parity & npm run generate:test:contracts && truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test-upgrade/* --network integration
scripts.test:contracts:upgrade:ganache: npm run start:blockchain:client & npm run generate:test:contracts && truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test-upgrade/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts:gasCosts: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test test-gas-costs/gasCosts.js --network development
scripts.test:contracts:patricia: npm run start:blockchain:client parity & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test packages/reputation-miner/patricia-test.js --network development
scripts.test:contracts:watch: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle watch --network development
scripts.test:contracts:e2e: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test test-system/end-to-end.js --network development
scripts.test:contracts:security: truffle run verify --mode quick --style json --limit 1 | grep '^\[{"' > truffle-security-output.json; node ./scripts/process-truffle-security.js
scripts.posttest:contracts:upgrade:parity: npm run clean:test:contracts | npm run stop:blockchain:client
scripts.posttest:contracts:upgrade:ganache: npm run clean:test:contracts | npm run stop:blockchain:client
scripts.viz:bootstrap: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle exec --network development scripts/viz-bootstrap.js

hooks.pre-commit: yarn eslint-staged && yarn solium-staged && yarn build:docs && git add docs
